name: AnthraxTestsForBacillisAnthracisAntigen
title: Anthrax (Tests for Bacillis anthracis Antigen)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Bacillus anthracis antigen.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Bacillus anthracis antigen;  

LOINC search term: Bacillus anthracis Ag -isolate),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
